analysis.Summary: Vue 3 component that renders a set of pre-defined date options (today, tomorrow, this weekend, this week, next weekend, next week) and emits a standardized date range payload when the user clicks on one of them.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable UI section for users to quickly pick common date ranges in the events module and notify parent components about the selected date range.

Components.name: SelectDate.vue
Components.responsibility: Renders the list of date options, computes their labels and ranges, and handles user selection.

Functions.name: formatSingleDate
Functions.purpose: Format a single Date object into a localized string with weekday short, day number and short month.

Functions.name: formatDateRange
Functions.purpose: Format two dates into a localized range string. If they are in the same month it collapses the month label.

Functions.name: setStartOfDay
Functions.purpose: Normalize a Date object to the start of its day (00:00:00.000).

Functions.name: setEndOfDay
Functions.purpose: Normalize a Date object to the end of its day (23:59:59.999).

Functions.name: computedDateOptions
Functions.purpose: Vue computed property that returns an array of date option objects. It either uses `props.customDateOptions` if provided or builds default options for today, tomorrow, this weekend, this week, next weekend and next week.

Functions.name: handleDateSelect
Functions.purpose: Emit a `date-selected` event with the payload `{ startDate, endDate, ... }` when a date option is clicked.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: An object containing `label`, `range`, and `data` with date boundaries.

analysis.Usage: Imported into parent components (e.g. EventsPage.vue) via `import SelectDate from 'modules/events/components/sections/SelectDate.vue'` and used in template as `<SelectDate :locale="locale" @date-selected="onDateSelected" />`.
Notes: The `thisMonth` and `customDate` options are defined but currently commented out; they can be reactivated as needed.
Accepts `customDateOptions` prop to override default date list with external data.
SCSS block is present but contains no custom rules; component styling relies on global utility classes from the martyrs framework.
